title: Boston Dynamics又有新野 中國或成最大贏家

replies.msg:
SpotMini autonomously navigates a specified route through an office and lab facility.

https://youtu.be/Ve9kWX_KXus

Before the test, the robot is manually driven through the space so it can build a map of the space using visual data from cameras mounted on the front, back and sides of the robot.

During the autonomous run, SpotMini uses data from the cameras to localize itself in the map and to detect and avoid obstacles. Once the operator presses 'GO' at the beginning of the video, the robot is on its own.

(The QR codes visible in the video are used to measure performance, not for navigation.)
